products.title: Built-in Shapewear Sexy Lace Slip Split Maxi Dress
products.description: The Popilush Built-in Shapewear Sexy Lace Slip Split Maxi Dress with a Body-hugging fit and a Deep-V neck is suitable for wedding, party, date, honeymoon trip, and shopping. With steel wire, it supports your breasts, and don't need to wear a bra. Exquisite lace with thin adjustable shoulder straps. Built-in compressive shorts: tummy control and waist trimming, creating an hourglass figure. The overlapping crotch design makes it convenient for your lavatory visits and prevents positional changes. The crotch is made of cotton fabric and no underwear is needed. Soft and smooth fabric, tight and delicate, 4 ways elastic and skin-friendly.
